name: Of Men And Masks
description:
Manage News stations & Police forces to push back against the Anti-Mask movement.

Controls
Mouse

Made with
Unity
Maya
Substance Painter
Procreate

Credits
Alexandre Delgery - Game Design & Programming
Océane Graça - Art & 3D Modelling

Inspired by "September 12th" and Nicky Case's "the wisdom and/or madness of crowds".
